content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0))

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0))

### New Stone Furnace at position (2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 2))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The first and second furnaces reported being full when trying to insert iron plates.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Verify that there are enough items in the furnace to extract. Both furnaces reported having no ingredients to smelt when extraction was attempted.

### Errors when crafting items
- Make sure you have enough required materials in your inventory to craft items. The agent encountered issues crafting transport belts due to insufficient iron plates.

### Errors related to missing entities
- Ensure that all required entities, such as steam engines, are placed on the map before attempting to use them. The agent received an error indicating that no steam engine was found when trying to power the new stone furnace.
